name: @starfleet/data-workspace
description: ðŸ–– D.A.T.A. - Database Automation, Testing, and Alignment for PostgreSQL/Supabase

scripts.migrate:dev: npm run migrate:generate && npm run migrate:test
scripts.migrate:prod: npm run migrate:test && npm run migrate:promote
scripts.migrate:ci: npm run migrate:verify && npm run migrate:test
scripts.jsdoc:generate: find src bin scripts -name '*.js' -type f | xargs node ./scripts/jsdoc/generate-jsdoc.js
scripts.jsdoc:generate:verbose: find src bin scripts -name '*.js' -type f | xargs node ./scripts/jsdoc/generate-jsdoc.js --verbose
scripts.jsdoc:generate:force: find src bin scripts -name '*.js' -type f | xargs node ./scripts/jsdoc/generate-jsdoc.js --force
scripts.jsdoc:dry-run: find src bin scripts -name '*.js' -type f | xargs node ./scripts/jsdoc/generate-jsdoc.js --dry-run --verbose
